channel.title: Official Runescape - Could use help
channel.description:
[b]This is not to beg for money.[/b] [i]But.[/i] A friend of mine has a PC that he wants to sell to me, but guess what.. for RS gold. I don't really have real money to spend on in game cash, so i'm farming as much gold as i can. So if you want to help me, and have some cash in real RS that you don't use anyway, you CAN help me and i would appreciate it^^ I'll get the amount he wants at some point or another but abit of help would be nice^^
([b]send me a PM or react here if you want to help[/b])
[size=14pt][b]For who wants to know.[/b][/size] YES, i am still working on RSDW V3 at the moment, but it takes me a long while with my old system. (single core Pentium 4 2GHz) this will help me complete it earlier, and i may decide to give people who help me here, a special something in RSDW, but thats no promise since it doesn't cost me anything to do so. And i don't want to sell RSDW things for donators and stuff like that.
I hope this doesn't effect my reputation here.. ~DermonWars

And i don’t say how much i need, because that may seem whore-ish
